gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.meta
Class Mediator

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.meta.Mediator

public class Mediator
extends Object

Mediator is the intermediate that gets or sets the values of properties described by BoPropertyDescriptor objects.

                         T value,
                         Object bean)
              throws ValidationException
Sets the value to the property defined by the BoPropertyDescriptor.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of value.
Parameters:
boPD - BoPropertyDescriptor that describes the property.
value - Value to set.
bean - Bean on which the new value will be set.
Throws:
ValidationException - If the value is not valid according to the BoPropertyDescriptor.

getValues

public <T> Map<BoPropertyDescriptor<?>,Object> getValues(BusinessObjectDescriptor<T> descriptor,
                                                         T bean)
Gets the values of a beans properties as they are described by a BusinessObjectDescriptor that describes the bean.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of bean.
Parameters:
descriptor - Descriptor of bean.
bean - Bean
Returns:
Returns a Map that maps the the bean's BoPropertyDescriptors with their corresponding values.

setValues

public void setValues(Map<BoPropertyDescriptor<?>,Object> propertyValues,
                      Object bean)
               throws MultipleValidationsException
Gets the values of a beans properties as they are described by a BusinessObjectDescriptor that describes the bean. This method first validates all values and the set them to the bean. If any of the values is invalid, then the bean will remain unmodified, while a MultipleValidationsException will be thrown.

Parameters:
propertyValues - Map with the values of the bean's properties to set.
bean - Bean on which the values are to be set.
Throws:
MultipleValidationsException - That contains a message for each property that has an invalid value.

validate

public void validate(Map<BoPropertyDescriptor<?>,Object> propertyValues)
              throws MultipleValidationsException
Validates a set of values each against a BoPropertyDescriptor.

Parameters:
propertyValues - Map with the values of the bean's properties to validate.
Throws:
MultipleValidationsException - That contains a message for each property that has an invalid value.

validate

public <T> void validate(BusinessObjectDescriptor<T> descriptor,
                         T bean)
              throws MultipleValidationsException
Validates the values of a bean against a BusinessObjectDescriptor that describes it.

Type Parameters:
T - Type of bean.
Parameters:
descriptor - Business object descriptor that describes the bean.
bean - Bean to validate.
Throws:
MultipleValidationsException - That contains a message for each property that has an invalid value.
